final_answer.explanation:
To determine the duration over which the 2009 title "Things to Come" was released, we first identify the relevant years involved in this calculation. The title was released in 2009, and the earliest year mentioned in the dataset is 1992. To calculate the total span of years, we use the formula: 

\[ \text{Span} = \text{Latest Year} - \text{Earliest Year} + 1 \] 

Substituting the values: 
\[ \text{Span} = 2009 - 1992 + 1 = 18 \] 

Thus, the title "Things to Come" was active over a span of 18 years, from 1992 to 2009 inclusive. This means that the title was released over a period of 18 years, considering the range from the earliest album release in 1992 to the year of the title's release in 2009.

graph.title: Calculate Year Range
graph.content: <1342>[Calculate Year Range] Determine the range of years covered in the data from the earliest to the latest year.</1342>
graph.answer:
The task involves calculating the year span during which a title released in 2009 was active, based on the provided data. The earliest year extracted from the dataset is 1992, and the latest year is 2011. The calculation to determine the span of years is straightforward: 

1. **Earliest Year**: 1992
2. **Latest Year**: 2011
3. **Calculation**: 2011 - 1992 = 19 years

Thus, the title released in 2009 was active over a span of 19 years, from 1992 to 2011.

answer.explanation:
To determine the duration over which the 2009 title "Things to Come" was released, we first identify the relevant years involved in this calculation. The title was released in 2009, and the earliest year mentioned in the dataset is 1992. To calculate the total span of years, we use the formula: 

\[ \text{Span} = \text{Latest Year} - \text{Earliest Year} + 1 \] 

Substituting the values: 
\[ \text{Span} = 2009 - 1992 + 1 = 18 \] 

Thus, the title "Things to Come" was active over a span of 18 years, from 1992 to 2009 inclusive. This means that the title was released over a period of 18 years, considering the range from the earliest album release in 1992 to the year of the title's release in 2009.
